## QA Checklist

### Author

- [ ] Code Review
- [ ] Functionality Tested (iOS and Android + different screens)
- [ ] Light/Dark mode tested
- [ ] Performance/Energy Consumption Tested (especially in ride view)

### Reviewer

- [ ] Code Review
- [ ] Functionality Tested (iOS and Android + different screens)
- [ ] Light/Dark mode tested
- [ ] Performance/Energy Consumption Tested (especially in ride view)
